features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: A robust infrastructure handling security, billing, and scalability so you can focus on your code.

multipleServices.title: Multiple Services, One Key
multipleServices.description: Access PDF Tools, Document Intelligence, and Mileage Generators via a single unified API.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: Keys are hashed using SHA-256. Granular scopes allow you to restrict keys to specific services.

realTime.title: Real-Time Usage & Cost
realTime.description: Monitor your credit consumption and API latency down to the millisecond.

logs.title: Live API Logs
logs.description: Inspect requests and debug issues instantly.

pricing.title: Simple, Usage-Based Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, buy credits when you need them. Credits valid for 1 year.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about credits and billing

howCreditsWork.question: How do credits work?
howCreditsWork.answer: Credits are prepaid and valid for 1 year from purchase. Each API call deducts credits based on the service used (e.g., PDF merge = 5 credits, OCR = 10 credits). Check your dashboard to track consumption in real-time.

buyMore.question: Can I buy more credits later?
buyMore.answer: Yes! You can purchase additional credit packs anytime. Unused credits roll over and remain valid until their expiration date (1 year from purchase). You can also enable auto-refill to prevent service interruptions.

runOut.question: What happens when I run out of credits?
runOut.answer: When your credit balance reaches zero, API calls will return a 402 Payment Required error. Simply purchase a new credit pack to resume service immediately. We recommend enabling notifications to get alerts when credits are low.
